item.title: Stuffing
item.description: Ochoa Family Stuffing Recipe Dictated from James Ochoa but made originally by Grandma (Juanita) Ochoa Ingredients: 2 stalks of organic celery, split, cut into bite sized pieces, use all the celery 4 bunches of green onions, sliced Mushrooms - your choice, pulled or cut into bit sized pieces (James addition, not in original recipe) A single bunch of parsley 4 sprigs of rosemary, pulled off the stalk and minced 12-14 sage leafs 6 sprigs of thyme taken off the stalk Salt, pepper to task.
